website_summaries.verdict: Silky formula ensures a smooth, sleek blowout without drying out hair. Speeds up dry time, especially for long hair.
pros: Ideal for thick, frizzy hair that needs to dry into a smooth, shiny style
Scent is pleasant without being overwhelming
Blowout stays soft and bouncy throughout the day, even in humid conditions
cons: Most effective when used with other OGX products in the Silk Styling line, so results are subjective when used on its own
